item.title: By: Cate O'Malley
item.dc:creator: Cate O'Malley
item.description: Butter Chicken (Chicken Makhani) is one of our favorite Indian food entrees. Making it as a pie sounds like a delicious alternative!
item.content:encoded: Butter Chicken (Chicken Makhani) is one of our favorite Indian food entrees. Making it as a pie sounds like a delicious alternative!

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: Butter chicken AND pie?!? That's such a brilliant combination :)
item.content:encoded: Butter chicken AND pie?!? That’s such a brilliant combination ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi everyone Thanks for all the comments! I thought making a butter chicken pie was a little strange when Nick first suggested it, although it really works well.
Shez - I'm glad I'm not the only one who gets told "anything" when asking what someone wants. I bet you had a great dinner with a variety of Mexican foods.
Lorraine - Thanks for the Happy Birthday message for my mum - she had a great night.
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone
Thanks for all the comments!
I thought making a butter chicken pie was a little strange when Nick first suggested it, although it really works well.

Shez – I’m glad I’m not the only one who gets told “anything” when asking what someone wants. I bet you had a great dinner with a variety of Mexican foods.

Lorraine – Thanks for the Happy Birthday message for my mum – she had a great night.

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: I love the idea of making this into a pie. Curries with delicious gravy really lend themselves to the pie medium-yum! Happy Birthday to your mum :)
item.content:encoded: I love the idea of making this into a pie. Curries with delicious gravy really lend themselves to the pie medium-yum! Happy Birthday to your mum ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Wow, I'd never thought to put curry in a pie rather than eat it with rice. Great idea
item.content:encoded: Wow, I’d never thought to put curry in a pie rather than eat it with rice. Great idea

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: This is such a nice idea. You get to eat butter chicken and pie at the same time - brilliant! I like the way you have sweet potatoes in it too.
item.content:encoded: This is such a nice idea. You get to eat butter chicken and pie at the same time – brilliant! I like the way you have sweet potatoes in it too.

item.title: By: shez
item.dc:creator: shez
item.description:
butter chicken - yum! in a pie? even better! that sounds (and looks) absolutely delicious.
and i totally empathise with the whole "what do you want for dinner?" "oh anything" issue. last year we made our mum a variety of things because all she would say was "mexican".
item.content:encoded:
butter chicken – yum! in a pie? even better! that sounds (and looks) absolutely delicious.

and i totally empathise with the whole “what do you want for dinner?” “oh anything” issue. last year we made our mum a variety of things because all she would say was “mexican”.
